title: Pipeline to the Clouds
brief_description: Shows the problems of water conservation and distribution. Animated cartoon show various means of finding and storing water. Reveals the wide use of water for industry. Suggests the establishment of nations ‘grids” of water pipes as a solution to the shortages recurring in many areas. Urges economy, mentioning that an average city can lose 500,000 gallons in a day through faulty plumbing.
